acidresistance.name: Acid Resistance
acidresistance.description: Takes half damage from acid-based attacks.

actually.name: Actually...
actually.description: You have advantage on Intelligence checks to recall obscure information.

adaptivephysiology.name: Adaptive Physiology
adaptivephysiology.description: Advantage on checks to resist physical alterations.

aircushion.name: Air Cushion
aircushion.description: You can use your reaction to reduce falling damage to 0.

alwaysprepared.name: Always Prepared
alwaysprepared.description: You can take the Hide action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

ambidextrous.name: Ambidextrous
ambidextrous.description: No penalties for using either hand.

amphibious.name: Amphibious
amphibious.description: Can breathe both air and water.

anatomicalexpertise.name: Anatomical Expertise
anatomicalexpertise.description: You have advantage on attacks targeting specific body parts.

ancientknowledge.name: Ancient Knowledge
ancientknowledge.description: All higher-tier skills are unlocked and can be trained to level 20.

arcaneinsight.name: Arcane Insight
arcaneinsight.description: You have advantage on Intelligence (Arcana) checks related to understanding magical effects or items.

arenaveteran.name: Arena Veteran
arenaveteran.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened or charmed in combat situations.

aurareading.name: Aura Reading
aurareading.description: You can detect diseases and emotional disturbances in creatures within 30 feet.

auraofgloom.name: Aura of Gloom
auraofgloom.description: Enemies within 10 feet of you have disadvantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks.

auraofprotection.name: Aura of Protection
auraofprotection.description: Allies within 10 feet of you gain a +1 bonus to all saving throws.

autobuckleractivation.name: AutoBucklerActivation
autobuckleractivation.description: Forms a metallic buckler on command or by shaking your wrist.

backpatchbonus.name: Back Patch Bonus
backpatchbonus.description: If an eligible Back Patch is added, this benefit is doubled.

battledancer.name: Battle Dancer
battledancer.description: Your AC increases by 2 when you're not wearing armor.

beastwhisperer.name: Beast Whisperer
beastwhisperer.description: You can communicate simple ideas with animals.

blastresistant.name: Blast Resistant
blastresistant.description: You have resistance to fire damage and thunder damage.

bloodsense.name: Bloodsense
bloodsense.description: You can detect living creatures within 30 feet by sensing their blood.

bonked.name: Bonked
bonked.description: Has a 5% chance to inflict Bonked on any mob struck with this weapon.

buffetenchantment.name: Buffet Enchantment
buffetenchantment.description: The crossbow will not run out of basic ammunition.
buffetenchantment.effect: Additional ammunition types can be loaded and fired, though special bonuses apply only to the stock ammunition.

calmingpresence.name: Calming Presence
calmingpresence.description: You can use your action to end the frightened condition on an ally within 30 feet.

camouflageexpert.name: Camouflage Expert
camouflageexpert.description: You have advantage on Stealth checks in natural environments.

cat-likereflexes.name: Cat-like Reflexes
cat-likereflexes.description: You have advantage on Dexterity saving throws.

centerstage.name: Center Stage
centerstage.description: When you're the target of an attack, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

charmresistance.name: Charm Resistance
charmresistance.description: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed.

coinburst.name: Coin Burst
coinburst.description: All mobs killed with this weapon have a 20% chance to burst into a pile of gold coins upon death.
coinburst.effect: The number of coins is equal to the (value of the items in their inventory) + (level x 10).

coldblood.name: Cold Blood
coldblood.description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison and disease.

coldimmunity.name: Cold Immunity
coldimmunity.description: You are immune to cold damage and environmental effects of extreme cold.

coldresistance.name: Cold Resistance
coldresistance.description: Takes half damage from cold-based attacks.

criticalgamble.name: Critical Gamble
criticalgamble.description: Every shot has a 50% chance to be a critical hit, dealing double damage.

crowddispersal.name: Crowd Dispersal
crowddispersal.description: You have advantage on Strength checks to push, shove, or knock prone multiple targets at once.

crowdfavorite.name: Crowd Favorite
crowdfavorite.description: You have advantage on Charisma checks to influence crowds or gather information in urban settings.

damagereflect.name: DamageReflect
damagereflect.description: Adds 10% Damage Reflect to all equipped armor.

dangersense.name: Danger Sense
dangersense.description: You can take the Search action as a bonus action on your turn.

darkone'sblessing.name: Dark One's Blessing
darkone'sblessing.description: When you reduce a hostile creature to 0 hit points, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier + your Warlock level.

darkvision.name: Darkvision
darkvision.description: Can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

demolitionsexpert.name: Demolitions Expert
demolitionsexpert.description: You have advantage on checks to disarm traps and on saving throws against explosive devices.

demonworshipperdetection.name: DemonWorshipperDetection
demonworshipperdetection.description: All demon worshippers are visible and marked on your map.

dimensionalawareness.name: Dimensional Awareness
dimensionalawareness.description: Your body can adapt to a wide range of environments and situations. +1 in one skill of your choice at the start of each floor.

diseaseresistance.name: Disease Resistance
diseaseresistance.description: Immune to common diseases and ailments.

divineprotection.name: Divine Protection
divineprotection.description: You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

eagleeye.name: Eagle Eye
eagleeye.description: You can accurately hit targets at twice the normal range.

earthsense.name: Earth Sense
earthsense.description: Can detect vibrations in the ground up to 60 feet.

elementalaffinity.name: Elemental Affinity
elementalaffinity.description: You have resistance to lightning and cold damage.

embarrassingstrikes.name: Embarrassing Strikes
embarrassingstrikes.description: When you land a critical hit, the target has disadvantage on their next action due to shame.

enhancedmobdetection.name: Enhanced Mob Detection
enhancedmobdetection.description: Increased ability to detect mobs on the map.

enhancedvision.name: Enhanced Vision
enhancedvision.description: Enhances all dark vision effects. Allows for heat vision and other visible-light viewing options.

environmentalprotection.name: Environmental Protection
environmentalprotection.description: Protects the eyes from a variety of environmental hazards, including magic-based attacks that render the user blind.

experimentalresistance.name: Experimental Resistance
experimentalresistance.description: You have advantage on saving throws against poisons and magical effects.

explosiveexpertise.name: Explosive Expertise
explosiveexpertise.description: +50% range and accuracy for all thrown explosives.

faefury.name: Fae Fury
faefury.description: For every female in your party, up to thirty, this items damage and firing speed is increased.
faefury.effect: Add an extra attack per round per female member of the party. Add 1d12 per female member of the party.

fearsomepresence.name: Fearsome Presence
fearsomepresence.description: Creatures that fail a Wit save against your abilities are frightened of you for 1 minute.

feyancestry.name: Fey Ancestry
feyancestry.description: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed and magic can't put you to sleep.

fireaffinity.name: Fire Affinity
fireaffinity.description: You have resistance to fire damage and can speak to fire elementals.

fireresistance.name: FireResistance
fireresistance.description: User is resistant to fire-based spells.

fireimmunity.name: FireImmunity
fireimmunity.description: User is impervious to natural fire.

firespellboost.name: FireSpellBoost
firespellboost.description: All spells with a fire attack now deal (Intelligence)% more damage.

firststrike.name: First Strike
firststrike.description: You have advantage on initiative rolls.

flexibleform.name: Flexible Form
flexibleform.description: Can squeeze through spaces as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

flight.name: Flight
flight.description: Can fly at a speed of 30 feet.

fragilepower.name: Fragile Power
fragilepower.description: Your damage spells deal an extra die of damage, but you have -2 to your AC.

freeballing.name: Freeballing
freeballing.description: And I’m freeeeee! Freeee Ballling! Usually reserved for monk classes and those too soused to reliably dress themselves, recipients of this benefit receive an additional 100% damage bonus to all attacks that originate below the waist. In addition, all skills that originate from below the waist train 20% faster. But as the name implies, this benefit allows only a single layer of armor or clothing to cover your crotch area. And since you’re already wearing these, it looks like you won’t be getting trousers anytime soon.
freeballing.effect: 100% additional bonus damage and 20% additional experience for all attacks that originate below the waist

frozenaura.name: Frozen Aura
frozenaura.description: The air around you is perpetually chilled. You have advantage on Stealth checks in snowy environments, and your melee attacks deal an additional 1d4 cold damage.

gravitydefiance.name: Gravity Defiance
gravitydefiance.description: You can slow your fall rate and take no damage from falls of 60 feet or less.

gruesomedisplay.name: Gruesome Display
gruesomedisplay.description: After killing an enemy, nearby foes must make a Wit save or be frightened for 1 round.

guardian'spresence.name: Guardian's Presence
guardian'spresence.description: Allies within 5 feet of you gain +2 to their AC.

gutinstinct.name: Gut Instinct
gutinstinct.description: You have advantage on Medicine checks related to internal injuries.

heataura.name: Heat Aura
heataura.description: Creatures within 5 feet take 1d4 fire damage at the start of their turn.

heatresistance.name: Heat Resistance
heatresistance.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

heatresistant.name: Heat Resistant
heatresistant.description: You have resistance to fire damage and advantage on saving throws against heat-based effects.

heavenlyconnections.name: Heavenly Connections
heavenlyconnections.description: Once per day, you can attempt to contact your demigod employer for advice or assistance.

heavyarmor.name: Heavy Armor
heavyarmor.description: Natural armor grants +2 bonus to AC.

honorbound.name: Honor Bound
honorbound.description: You have advantage on Charisma checks when dealing with nobility or in formal settings.

hostdependency.name: Host Dependency
hostdependency.description: Must inhabit a host to survive.

hypnoticgaze.name: Hypnotic Gaze
hypnoticgaze.description: You can use your action to attempt to charm a creature within 30 feet, forcing a Wit saving throw.

illusoryescape.name: Illusory Escape
illusoryescape.description: Once per short rest, when you would take damage, you can use your reaction to create an illusion of yourself and teleport up to 30 feet away.

immovable.name: Immovable
immovable.description: You have advantage on ability checks and saving throws against effects that would move you against your will.

incrementaldamage.name: Incremental Damage
incrementaldamage.description: This weapon's damage increases by 1.5% for every mob it kills that is no more than 10 levels below the current wielder's level.

infection.name: Infection
infection.description: Successful hits have a 10% chance to inflict Tetanus, dealing 1d4 damage per round for 3 rounds.
infection.effect: 10% chance to deal 1d4 damage per round for 3 rounds.

infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
infiltrator.description: You can blend into a crowd, gaining advantage on Stealth checks in populated areas.

infraredvision.name: Infrared Vision
infraredvision.description: Can detect heat signatures up to 30 feet.

insightful.name: Insightful
insightful.description: You have advantage on Perception checks to determine a creature's emotional state.

inspiringpresence.name: Inspiring Presence
inspiringpresence.description: Allies within 30 feet of you gain a +1 bonus to saving throws.

ironstomach.name: Iron Stomach
ironstomach.description: You're immune to poison and have advantage on Constitution saving throws against ingested substances.

ironwill.name: Iron Will
ironwill.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

keenedge.name: Keen Edge
keenedge.description: Your bladed weapons deal an additional 1d4 damage.

keensenses.name: Keen Senses
keensenses.description: Advantage on Perception checks involving smell.

lavaimmunity.name: LavaImmunity
lavaimmunity.description: User is impervious to lava attacks.

legendarystrength.name: Legendary Strength
legendarystrength.description: You can carry, push, drag, or lift twice as much as normal.

light-footed.name: Light-footed
light-footed.description: You can move through difficult terrain without penalty.

livingshield.name: Living Shield
livingshield.description: You can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on an attack roll against an ally within 5 feet of you.

loaded.name: Loaded
loaded.description: All non-hidden creatures wearing magical gear are indicated on your map. Particularly useful when you only want to hang out with the real fashionistas and not just the posers wearing fake shit. Also good if you want to sneak up behind someone, bonk them on their head, and steal all their stuff.

long-rangeexpert.name: Long-Range Expert
long-rangeexpert.description: You have advantage on attack rolls against targets more than 100 feet away.

luckybreak.name: Lucky Break
luckybreak.description: Once per short rest, you can reroll a failed ability check, attack roll, or saving throw.

lyricalmemory.name: Lyrical Memory
lyricalmemory.description: You can perfectly recall any poem or song you've heard at least once.

magicresistance.name: Magic Resistance
magicresistance.description: Advantage on saves against magical effects.

managenita'sfavor.name: ManaGenita's Favor
managenita'sfavor.description: Removes automatic hostility by worshippers of Mana Genita.

mastercraftsman.name: Master Craftsman
mastercraftsman.description: You can identify the properties of any metal item by examining it for 1 minute.

masterofdisguise.name: Master of Disguise
masterofdisguise.description: You have advantage on Deception checks when trying to pass yourself off as someone else.

meleeimmunity.name: Melee Immunity
meleeimmunity.description: All melee-based damage debuffs such as Stun, Knockback, Disarm, and Out-of-Breath are negated.

mentalfortitude.name: Mental Fortitude
mentalfortitude.description: Advantage on saves against mind control.

mimicry.name: Mimicry
mimicry.description: Can imitate sounds they have heard.

mindshield.name: Mind Shield
mindshield.description: Advantage on saves against mental attacks.

mobmentality.name: Mob Mentality
mobmentality.description: You have advantage on attack rolls when within 5 feet of an ally.

naturalcamouflage.name: Natural Camouflage
naturalcamouflage.description: Advantage on Stealth checks in forested areas.

naturalcharmer.name: Natural Charmer
naturalcharmer.description: You have advantage on Persuasion checks when interacting with non-hostile NPCs.

neithersnownorrain.name: Neither Snow Nor Rain
neithersnownorrain.description: You gain advantage on saving throws against environmental hazards while on a delivery.

nightvision.name: Night Vision
nightvision.description: Can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

nimbledefense.name: Nimble Defense
nimbledefense.description: While wearing light or no armor, your AC increases by 1 for every point of Dexterity bonus (maximum +3).

nimbleescape.name: Nimble Escape
nimbleescape.description: You can use the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

onewithearth.name: One with Earth
onewithearth.description: While touching the ground, you can sense vibrations within a 60-foot radius.

onewithnature.name: One with Nature
onewithnature.description: You can communicate simple ideas with animals and have advantage on Animal Handling checks.

otherworldlypatron.name: Otherworldly Patron
otherworldlypatron.description: You have a powerful entity as your patron, granting you unique abilities based on their nature.

paintolerance.name: Pain Tolerance
paintolerance.description: You have advantage on saving throws against pain-inducing effects.

paranoia.name: Paranoia
paranoia.description: You have advantage on Perception checks to spot hidden threats.

passionateaura.name: Passionate Aura
passionateaura.description: Allies within 10 feet of you gain +1 to attack rolls and saving throws against fear effects.

perfectpitch.name: Perfect Pitch
perfectpitch.description: You have advantage on saving throws against sound-based effects and can perfectly mimic any sound you've heard.

persistentirritant.name: Persistent Irritant
persistentirritant.description: Enemies within 5 feet of you have disadvantage on concentration checks.

pestsense.name: Pest Sense
pestsense.description: You can detect the presence of vermin within 60 feet of you.

plaguedoctor.name: Plague Doctor
plaguedoctor.description: You have resistance to disease and can identify ailments with a successful Intelligence check.

poisonresistance.name: Poison Resistance
poisonresistance.description: Takes half damage from poison-based attacks.

powerofbelief.name: Power of Belief
powerofbelief.description: Once per day, you can reroll a failed healing ability and take the higher result.

predator'sinstinct.name: Predator's Instinct
predator'sinstinct.description: You have advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing or smell.

protectiveinstinct.name: Protective Instinct
protectiveinstinct.description: When an ally within 30 feet is attacked, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

psychichotline.name: Psychic Hotline
psychichotline.description: You can use your action to gain advantage on your next Charisma check.

psychicresistance.name: Psychic Resistance
psychicresistance.description: Takes half damage from psychic attacks.

psychicshield.name: Psychic Shield
psychicshield.description: Advantage on saves against psychic damage.

quickreflexes.name: QuickReflexes
quickreflexes.description: Increases the user’s reaction time, giving a +1 bonus to dodge checks.

quickstudy.name: Quick Study
quickstudy.description: Can learn and replicate simple actions after observing them once.

quickdraw.name: Quickdraw
quickdraw.description: You have advantage on initiative rolls when using a ranged weapon.

regeneration.name: Regeneration
regeneration.description: Regains 1d6 HP at the start of their turn if they have drunk blood in the last 24 hours.

regimentedtraining.name: Regimented Training
regimentedtraining.description: You can don or doff armor in half the usual time.

relentlessendurance.name: Relentless Endurance
relentlessendurance.description: Once per day when reduced to 0 HP can drop to 1 HP instead.

religiousaffiliationdetection.name: ReligiousAffiliationDetection
religiousaffiliationdetection.description: Instantly know the religious affiliation of all nearby mobs and crawlers.

remotedetonator.name: Remote Detonator
remotedetonator.description: If you’re one of those explodey guys, I bet you use a lot of Hobgoblin Pus or Troll Boom-Boom Paste to make your bombs pop. Those days are now over. This benefit allows you to magically remote-detonate any explosive that has been designated by you. This benefit offers multiple physical and interface-based triggering options when combined with a Sapper’s table.
remotedetonator.effect: When using a Sapper’s Table, you gain access to the following physical and interface-based triggering options for any explosive you have designated: Physical Triggering Options: Timed Detonation: Set a timer on the explosive to detonate after a specified duration. Pressure Plate: Detonate the explosive when a certain amount of weight or pressure is applied. Tripwire: Rig a tripwire to detonate the explosive when disturbed. Proximity Sensor: Set the explosive to detonate when a creature or object enters a specified radius. Interface-Based Triggering Options: Magical Remote Control: Use a magical remote control to trigger the explosive from a distance. Telepathic Link: Establish a telepathic link to trigger the explosive mentally. Arcane Signal: Activate the explosive using a specific magical gesture or incantation. Rune Activation: Use a magical interface to activate a special rune on the explosive. Special Note: The range for remote triggering options is up to 120 feet, unless otherwise specified by the DM.

removecurseditems.name: RemoveCursedItems
removecurseditems.description: Allows the removal of cursed items.

removedebuffs.name: RemoveDebuffs
removedebuffs.description: Removes most health-seeping and disease-based debuff effects. Variable numbing effect on various other debuff types.

resilient.name: Resilient
resilient.description: Advantage on saving throws against exhaustion or stamina-based debuffs.

resistancetofire.name: Resistance to Fire
resistancetofire.description: Takes half damage from fire-based attacks.

returntosender.name: Return to Sender
returntosender.description: Once per day, you can redirect a ranged attack that misses you back at the attacker.

ripe.name: Ripe
ripe.description: All creatures with less than 50% health are indicated on your map. This does not increase your map’s view, but used in conjunction with other skills such as Pathfinder, it makes being a glory-stealing asshole really easy

ritualmaster.name: Ritual Master
ritualmaster.description: You have advantage on skill checks related to performing religious or spiritual rituals.

rockyhide.name: Rocky Hide
rockyhide.description: Your skin toughens, granting you a +1 bonus to your natural Armor Class.

saddlesure.name: Saddle Sure
saddlesure.description: You have advantage on saves to avoid falling off your mount.

sepsisdebuff.name: Sepsis Debuff
sepsisdebuff.description: All attacks, including magical attacks, now have a 15% chance to inflict the Sepsis debuff.

shadowmeld.name: Shadow Meld
shadowmeld.description: Advantage on Stealth checks in dim light or darkness.

shatterenchantment.name: ShatterEnchantment
shatterenchantment.description: Any attack that lands upon the buckler has a 1.5% chance to disarm the opponent. If the opponent is disarmed, there is a 90% chance the weapon will drop to the ground, a 5% chance the weapon will break, and a 5% chance the weapon will be immediately transferred to your inventory.

sheolhealth.name: SheolHealth
sheolhealth.description: User will not lose health while inside Sheol.

shortfuse.name: Short Fuse
shortfuse.description: You have advantage on initiative rolls.

showmanship.name: Showmanship
showmanship.description: Your critical hits inspire allies within 30 feet, granting them advantage on their next attack roll.

shrinedestruction.name: ShrineDestruction
shrinedestruction.description: Allows the destruction of church shrines without further ill effects from deities.

silvertongue.name: Silver Tongue
silvertongue.description: You have advantage on Charisma checks involving poetry or wordplay.

skateordie.name: Skate or Die
skateordie.description: Your speed increases by 10 feet, and you ignore difficult terrain while moving.

sociallubricant.name: Social Lubricant
sociallubricant.description: Your vape creations grant you advantage on Charisma checks in social situations.

socialmediasavvy.name: Social Media Savvy
socialmediasavvy.description: You can use your action to gain advantage on your next Charisma check by leveraging your online presence.

spellfocus.name: Spell Focus
spellfocus.description: Any energy-based spell that originates from the ocular region is caught and focused by these goggles, which allows for multiple combat and targeting options.

spellsculptor.name: Spell Sculptor
spellsculptor.description: Once per short rest, you can change the elemental damage type of one of your spells as you cast it.

spiritualconduit.name: Spiritual Conduit
spiritualconduit.description: You can sense the presence of spirits within 60 feet and communicate with them.

steadydrinker.name: Steady Drinker
steadydrinker.description: Negates the dexterity debuff when inebriated

stonecunning.name: Stonecunning
stonecunning.description: Advantage on checks related to stonework.

streetsmarts.name: Street Smarts
streetsmarts.description: You have advantage on Perception (Survival) checks in urban environments.

structuralweakness.name: Structural Weakness
structuralweakness.description: You can use an action to analyze a structure and identify its weak points, granting advantage on attacks against it.

sure-footed.name: Sure-Footed
sure-footed.description: Advantage on checks and saves against being knocked prone.

surgicalstrikes.name: Surgical Strikes
surgicalstrikes.description: Your critical hits deal an extra die of damage.

suspiciousmind.name: Suspicious Mind
suspiciousmind.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

taskmaster.name: Taskmaster
taskmaster.description: Allies within earshot of your commands gain a +2 bonus to Strength checks.

taxstipend.name: TaxStipend
taxstipend.description: Taxes received: 432 Gold every 10 days from Medium Skyfowl Settlement.

terrainmastery.name: Terrain Mastery
terrainmastery.description: You can move through difficult terrain without penalty.

toxinresistance.name: Toxin Resistance
toxinresistance.description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison and disease.

truthseeker.name: Truth Seeker
truthseeker.description: You have advantage on Perception (Insight) checks to determine if someone is lying.

unbreakable.name: Unbreakable
unbreakable.description: You have advantage on stamina saving throws to maintain concentration on spells or abilities.

unbreakableformation.name: Unbreakable Formation
unbreakableformation.description: Allies within 10 feet of you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

unbreakableline.name: Unbreakable Line
unbreakableline.description: While wielding a shield, allies adjacent to you gain +2 to their AC.

unbreakablespirit.name: Unbreakable Spirit
unbreakablespirit.description: Once per long rest, when you drop to 0 hit points, you can choose to drop to 1 hit point instead.

unbreakablestance.name: Unbreakable Stance
unbreakablestance.description: You have advantage on saving throws against effects that would knock you prone or move you against your will.

uncannyintuition.name: Uncanny Intuition
uncannyintuition.description: Once per day, you can reroll a failed Perception check.

undeadslayer.name: Undead Slayer
undeadslayer.description: +25% Magical damage against all sapient undead.

unpredictablebiology.name: Unpredictable Biology
unpredictablebiology.description: At the start of each day, roll a d20 to gain a random beneficial mutation for 24 hours.

unyieldingloyalty.name: Unyielding Loyalty
unyieldingloyalty.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

upgradeable.name: Upgradeable
upgradeable.description: This base stat upgrade increases by +1 for every compatible patch that is added to this jacket.

vaperesistance.name: Vape Resistance
vaperesistance.description: You have advantage on saving throws against inhaled poisons and gases.

versatile.name: Versatile
versatile.description: Can choose an additional +2 in any skill.

voiceofauthority.name: Voice of Authority
voiceofauthority.description: Your commands can be clearly heard by allies within 60 feet, even in the chaos of battle.

vulpinecharm.name: Vulpine Charm
vulpinecharm.description: You have advantage on Charisma checks against creatures that are not hostile toward you.

wallclimbing.name: Wall Climbing
wallclimbing.description: Can climb difficult surfaces including upside down on ceilings without needing to make an ability check.

warrior'spride.name: Warrior's Pride
warrior'spride.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

watercamouflage.name: Water Camouflage
watercamouflage.description: Advantage on Stealth checks in aquatic environments.

waterretention.name: Water Retention
waterretention.description: Requires less water than other races to survive.

weaponmastery.name: Weapon Mastery
weaponmastery.description: You can use your Strength modifier instead of Dexterity for attack and damage rolls with finesse weapons.

weaponwhisperer.name: Weapon Whisperer
weaponwhisperer.description: You can identify the magical properties of any bladed weapon by examining it for 1 minute.

weathersense.name: Weather Sense
weathersense.description: You can accurately predict the weather for the next 24 hours.

windwhisper.name: Wind Whisper
windwhisper.description: You can cast Message at will, without expending a spell slot.

wingsoffreedom.name: Wings of Freedom
wingsoffreedom.description: You have a flying speed equal to your walking speed.
